instruction.title: Run
instruction.text:
• If there is an escape path, attempt to evacuate 

 • Evacuate whether others agree or not 

 • Leave your belongings behind 

 • Help others escape if possible 

 • Prevent others from entering the area 

 • Meet at a predetermined area 

 • Do not leave campus 

 • Call 911 when  you are safe

instruction.title: Hide
instruction.text:
• Lock and/or blockade the door 

 • Hide behind large objects 

 • Silence your cell phone 

 • Remain very quiet

instruction.title: Fight
instruction.text:
• Incapacitate the shooter 

 • Act with physical aggression 

 • Improvise weapons 

 • Commit to your actions

instruction.title: When Law Enforcement arrives on the Scene
instruction.text:
• Do exactly as the officers instructs 

 • Do not approach the officers 

 • Keep your hands visible, fingers spread, and empty.
